CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Task lists for each team member, recurring task lists, and top task publishing requests
CurrentVersion.description:
Task publishing allows an organization to centrally define and distribute tasks across their frontline locations and monitor how that work is going. The task publishing capability will allow users to create recurring task lists that repeat on a selected cadence, to create lists assigned to everyone in a recipient team, to require a Microsoft Forms form as a prerequisite to completion, and to designate an approval as a prerequisite to completion.
More info: https://support.microsoft.com/office/publish-task-lists-to-create-and-track-work-in-your-organization-095409b3-f5af-40aa-9f9e-339b54e705df

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Task lists for each team member, recurring task lists, and top task publishing requests
OldVersion.description:
Task publishing allows an organization to centrally define and distribute tasks across their frontline locations and monitor how that work is going. The task publishing capability will allow users to create recurring task lists that repeat on a selected cadence, to create lists assigned to everyone in a recipient team, to require a Microsoft Forms form as a prerequisite to completion, and to designate an approval as a prerequisite to completion.
More info: https://support.microsoft.com/office/publish-task-lists-to-create-and-track-work-in-your-organization-095409b3-f5af-40aa-9f9e-339b54e705df

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Glint - Ability to customize surveys & team conversations
CurrentVersion.description: Microsoft Viva Glint now offers the capability to personalize surveys and team conversations. Additionally, users can customize their logo and sender domain.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Glint - Self service to customize reminders
OldVersion.description: Ability to customize survey reminders, nudges and other notifications and support additional languages

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Conditional Formatting in New Outlook for Windows and Web
CurrentVersion.description: Conditional formatting is a feature to make messages that meet defined conditions stand out in the message list by using different font colors. The users can specify conditions that an incoming message should meet, such as a sender’s name or email address. #newoutlookforwindows

OldVersion.title: Outlook: Conditional Formatting in New Outlook for Windows and Web
OldVersion.description: Conditional formatting is a feature to make messages that meet defined conditions stand out in the message list by using different font colors. The users can specify conditions that an incoming message should meet, such as a sender’s name or email address.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention - Simulation mode for DLP
CurrentVersion.description:
,
With this capability, Admins will be able to try a Microsoft Purview DLP policy, assess its impact, and fine tune the policy as required in an isolated experience. This will help Admins build confidence in the configuration of the policy and reduce the policy enforcement time.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention - Simulation mode for DLP
OldVersion.description:
,
With this capability, Admins will be able to try a Microsoft Purview DLP policy, assess its impact, and fine tune the policy as required in an isolated experience. This will help Admins build confidence in the configuration of the policy and reduce the policy enforcement time.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: The new Outlook for Windows - Offline support for mail actions and compose
CurrentVersion.description: The first set of offline capabilities in the new Outlook for Windows. Mail, calendar events, and contacts will be stored on your device, so you can view them even when you're not connected to the internet. Additionally, you can perform key actions on your mail, including flag, move, and delete, and compose messages, to stay productive even when you're not connected to the internet.

OldVersion.title: Outlook: The new Outlook for Windows - Offline support for mail actions and compose
OldVersion.description: The first set of offline capabilities in the new Outlook for Windows. Mail, calendar events, and contacts will be stored on your device, so you can view them even when you're not connected to the internet. Additionally, you can perform key actions on your mail, including flag, move, and delete, and compose messages, to stay productive even when you're not connected to the internet.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: In-Person Event
CurrentVersion.description: New option during event creation in Outlook will allow organizer to request invitees to attend the event in person. This feature will be available in the new Outlook for Windows and the web. #newoutlookforwindows.

OldVersion.title: Outlook: In-Person Event
OldVersion.description: New option during event creation in Outlook will allow organizer to request invitees to attend the event in person. This feature will be available in the new Outlook for Windows and the web.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Organizers can select languages for translation in a town hall
CurrentVersion.description: Town hall organizers will be able to select the caption languages that will be available to the attendees for translation. Currently the languages are preset for attendees to pick from; now organizers will be able to select the six translated languages available to attendees.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Organizers can select languages for translation in a town hall
OldVersion.description: Town hall organizers will be able to select the caption languages that will be available to the attendees for translation. Currently the languages are preset for attendees to pick from; now organizers will be able to select the six translated languages available to attendees.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Goals - New goal sharing experience
CurrentVersion.description: Users will now be able to experience the enhanced share functionality with supported platforms including Teams, Email, Slack along with Copy link options. They can share specific goals, initiatives, dashboards, explorer views, check-ins as well as entire goals or initiative lists.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Goals - New goal sharing experience
OldVersion.description: Users will now be able to experience the enhanced share functionality with supported platforms including Teams, Email, Slack along with Copy link options. They can share specific goals, initiatives, dashboards, explorer views, check-ins as well as entire goals or initiative lists.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: To Do app opens in the new Outlook for Windows
CurrentVersion.description: Use the To Do app without leaving the new Outlook for Windows! Click the To Do icon in the navigation bar to open inline without opening in a separate browser window. #newoutlookforwindows

OldVersion.title: Outlook: To Do app opens in the new Outlook for Windows
OldVersion.description: Use the To Do app without leaving the new Outlook for Windows! Click the To Do icon in the navigation bar to open inline without opening in a separate browser window.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Shared Mailboxes as Accounts
CurrentVersion.description: Shared Mailboxes can be added as Accounts in the new Outlook for Windows. The Shared Mailbox will appear at the Account Level in the Folder list. Access to the Shared Mailbox requires the user's credentials and associated permissions. #newoutlookforwindows

OldVersion.title: Outlook: Shared Mailboxes as Accounts
OldVersion.description: Shared Mailboxes can be added as Accounts in the new Outlook for Windows. The Shared Mailbox will appear at the Account Level in the Folder list. Access to the Shared Mailbox requires the user's credentials and associated permissions.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Organizers can select languages for translation in a town hall (Premium)
CurrentVersion.description: Town hall organizers will be able to select the caption languages that will be available to the attendees for translation. Currently the languages are preset for attendees to pick from; now organizers will be able to select the 10 translated languages available to attendees.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Organizers can select languages for translation in a town hall (Premium)
OldVersion.description: Town hall organizers will be able to select the caption languages that will be available to the attendees for translation. Currently the languages are preset for attendees to pick from; now organizers will be able to select the 10 translated languages available to attendees.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Sync feature
CurrentVersion.description: A button option to initiate email sync is coming to the new Outlook for Windows and Outlook on the web. This will allow users to ensure that their send and receive email experience is up to date. This functionality will be within the View tab of the Ribbon. #newoutlookforwindows.

OldVersion.title: Outlook: Sync feature
OldVersion.description: A button option to initiate email sync is coming to the new Outlook for Windows and Outlook on the web, this will allow users to ensure that their send and receive email experience is up-to-date. This functionality will be within the View tab of the Ribbon.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention - Simulation mode for DLP
CurrentVersion.description: ,With this capability, Admins will be able to try a Microsoft Purview DLP policy, assess its impact, and fine tune the policy as required in an isolated environment. This will help Admins build confidence in the configuration of the policy and reduce the policy enforcement time.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention - Simulation mode for DLP
OldVersion.description: ,With this capability, Admins will be able to try a Microsoft Purview DLP policy, assess its impact, and fine tune the policy as required in an isolated environment. This will help Admins build confidence in the configuration of the policy and reduce the policy enforcement time.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Microsoft Purview support for Webinars
CurrentVersion.description: IT admins can leverage Microsoft Purview for eDiscovery and legal hold needs to maintain compliance for webinars.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Microsoft Purview support for Webinars
OldVersion.description: IT admins can leverage Microsoft Purview for eDiscovery and legal hold needs to maintain compliance for webinars.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Microsoft Purview support for town hall
CurrentVersion.description: IT admins can leverage Microsoft Purview for eDiscovery and legal hold needs to maintain compliance for town halls.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Microsoft Purview support for town hall
OldVersion.description: IT admins can leverage Microsoft Purview for eDiscovery and legal hold needs to maintain compliance for town halls.

CurrentVersion.title: OneDrive: Annotate PDFs with Text
CurrentVersion.description: This feature allows you to annotate and save PDF files with text boxes, when those files are stored in OneDrive and SharePoint. Users can access the annotation feature by opening the PDF in file viewer and selecting “edit”.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Copilot for Microsoft 365 now available in the Microsoft Start app
CurrentVersion.description: Users with a Copilot for Microsoft 365 license will be able to receive answers grounded in their organizational Graph data with the Microsoft Start app. The app is available for iOS and Android.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Optimize for Video setting for screensharing
CurrentVersion.description: Provide setting to optimize screen sharing for video clip by reducing the lag and improving the quality of video playback when sharing video clips in Teams meetings

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Optimize for Video setting for screensharing
OldVersion.description: Provide setting to optimize screen sharing for video clip by reducing the lag and improving the quality of video playback when sharing video clips in Teams meetings

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: New app called Microsoft Viva Sales
CurrentVersion.description:
Microsoft Viva Sales is a new seller experience application that brings together a seller's customer relationship management (CRM) system, Microsoft 365 and Microsoft Teams to provide a more streamlined and AI-powered selling experience -- right from within the tools they use every day to connect with customers and close deals. This item is being removed from the roadmap as it is no longer applicable. We apologize for the delay in updating this information
More info: https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/microsoft-viva/sales?rtc=1

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: New app called Microsoft Viva Sales
OldVersion.description:
Microsoft Viva Sales is a new seller experience application that brings together a seller's customer relationship management (CRM) system, Microsoft 365 and Microsoft Teams to provide a more streamlined and AI-powered selling experience -- right from within the tools they use every day to connect with customers and close deals.

More info: https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/microsoft-viva/sales?rtc=1

CurrentVersion.title: Skype for Business: Microsoft Teams Skype to Teams Call Queue calling
CurrentVersion.description: This item is being removed from the roadmap as it is no longer applicable.  We apologize for the delay in updating this information. Skype for Business OnPrem user will be able to call Teams Call Queue via VoIP or PSTN

OldVersion.title: Skype for Business: Microsoft Teams Skype to Teams Call Queue calling
OldVersion.description: Skype for Business OnPrem user will be able to call Teams Call Queue via VoIP or PSTN
